title: Exorcisms - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/28/21
itunes:title: Exorcisms - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/28/21
description:
After discussing possible demonic interruption of his telephone earlier in the interview, George Noory and Catholic priest Monsignor Stephen Rossetti explore his career as an exorcist for the church, the dangers of ouija boards and other events that attract demonic spirits and debate why God allows evil and demons in the world.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A priest describes his work fighting off demons and evil spirits.
itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
